sentences.sContent: ...a list of the underhanded ways in which their influence operates in the United States.
sentences.sCn: …他们的势力在美国运作的一系列不正当手段。

synos.tran: 卑劣的；秘密的；人手不足的

remMethod.val: under(在…下面) + handed(有手的) → 在下面做手脚 → 秘密的

trans.tranOther: If an action is underhand or if it is done in an underhand way, it is done secretly and dishonestly
